name: Sheela

”Alexa, open hey sheela”
”get my bmi”
”calculate my bmi”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hey sheela
Developer Terms of Use
des: It is your healthcare companion which can calculate your BMI when your tell it your height and weight. You should ask Sheela to calculate your BMI and then answer her.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
